metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13091 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - negligible
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** pandas through 1.0.3 can unserialize and execute commandsfrom an untrusted file that is passed to the read_pickle() function, if__reduce__ makes an os.system call. NOTE: third parties dispute this issuebecause the read_pickle() function is documented as unsafe and it is theuser's responsibility to use the function in a secure manner.

criterions.comment: pandas: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
